title: Rep. Moulton on the state of the T, and U.S.-Taiwan relations
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Massachusetts Congressman Seth Moulton is just back from a trip to the Indo-Pacific, including Taiwan. He joins us to talk about the visit, as well as the latest on the MBTA.
